channel.title: Autumn 2025 on Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich
channel.description: Recent content in Autumn 2025 on Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich

item.title: Semester Welcome Event (Autumn 2025)
item.description: Join us for a lively kick-off to the Autumn semester 2024 at the bQm bar 🍻, where the Czech and Slovak Students in Zurich will meet up for a beer⭐. This is a great opportunity for both new and existing students to meet🤝. We look forward to seeing you there! 🎉
